author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Spaceandpeople Posts FY Pretax Profit Of 1.2 Mln Pounds
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Spaceandpeople Plc:
* FY ‍NET REVENUE OF £10.0 MILLION (2016: £9.7MILLION)​ * FY ‍PROFIT FROM BEFORE TAXATION ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS OF £1.2 MILLION (2016: £60K)​
* ‍DIVIDEND RESUMED WITH PROPOSED PAYMENT OF 1.5P PER SHARE (2016: NIL)​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
